.. _installation:

Installation
============

Requirements
------------

``pyshtransform`` only depends on:

- Python;
- NumPy_: for array support;
- SciPy_: for specific spline functions;
- Xarray_: for dataset support.

Instructions
------------

``pyshtransform`` is available on pypi, and can be installed for example
using ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install pyshtransform

.. _NumPy: https://numpy.org
.. _SciPy: https://scipy.org
.. _Xarray: https://xarray.dev
